scriptItem.label: Organize Import Paths
scriptItem.scriptCode: from omoospace_houdini import organize_import_paths items = kwargs.get("items", None) organize_import_paths(items)

scriptItem.label: Organize Export Paths
scriptItem.scriptCode: from omoospace_houdini import organize_export_paths items = kwargs.get("items", None) organize_export_paths(items)
